title: LoL is dpwnloading the new client very slow
body:
Oh hi everybody. I just wanna ask that my new LoL client is downloading VERY slow(I'm a new player) and i can't play because of that.
So please help me!(I've got the newest LoL)

Thank You!

pikachuGB0121  :)

replies.body: Hey, welcome to League!  Your connection could be struggling getting updated game files specifically from the patching server.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help tune up your network health.  There could be other factors too, for example the quality of your hard drive could determine how fast it will be able to write these game files.  I hope that helps!
